definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: lord (Targum [[מָר]], c. [[מָרֵי]]; Syr. more0, e. moro0, moryo0, Eg. Aram. [[מרא]] (RÉS:i. 361); Chr-Pal. m0r, etc., Schulth:Lex. 115; OAram. Nab. Palm. ([[א]])[[מר]] (Lzb:316); cf. n.pr. dei [[מרנא]] (marna), god of Gaza, SAC:77; also Ar. maro;un man, Sab. [[מרא]], man, lord Hom:Chr 127; AA 293 RÉS:i. 454, 2);—lord: of God, cstr. [[שְׁמַיׇּא]] Da 5:23, [[מָרֵה מַלְכִין]] Da 2:47; of king, sf. [[מָֽרְאִי]] Kt (as Nab., SAC:l.c.; K:§ 58, 1), Qr [[מָרִי]] (as Palm., SAC:l.c.) Da 4:16, Da 4:21.
